name: myfitnesspal_browse_recipes
description: Browse popular recipes on MyFitnessPal. Returns recipe names, calories, and ratings.

steps.code: const recipes = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[class*="recipe"], .recipe-card, article')).slice(0,20).map(el => { const title = el.querySelector('h2, h3, a, [class*="title"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const cal = el.querySelector('[class*="calories"], .nutrition-info')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const link = el.querySelector('a')?.href||''; return { title, calories: cal, url: link }; }).filter(r=>r.title); return { recipes, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
